organization.name: Radiant Hearts Women Group
organization.mission: To promote economic empowerment of members, support vulnerable women, and empower communities through innovative and compassionate initiatives.

projects.title: Family Planning Initiative
projects.description: Promoting access to family planning resources and education to empower women in Chuka to make informed reproductive health choices.

projects.title: Sack Gardening Program
projects.description: Teaching sustainable sack gardening techniques to enhance food security and economic independence for women in Tharaka-Nithi County.

projects.title: Women’s Rights Advocacy
projects.description: Advocating for gender equality and women’s rights through education, workshops, and community engagement in Chuka.

projects.title: Ending Violence Against Women
projects.description: Raising awareness and providing support to combat violence against women, fostering a safer community in Tharaka-Nithi.
